main event: A round, red object was observed at a very high altitude by several local citizens in Lima, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting occurred over several minutes between 8:00 PM and 2:00 AM local time., The object was spotted to the northeast., Local weather conditions included winds from the south-southwest at 30 knots., Lighted balloons were released in the area around the same time, which could explain the sighting., The report concluded that the object was likely a balloon.
